titleStmt.title: The vsurers plea answered In a sermon preached at Southampton the 18. day of Iuly, being Thursday, and their lecture day, 1633. By Roger Turner Mr. of Arts, and minister of Gods Word neere Southampton.
titleStmt.author: Turner, Roger, b. 1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe] for Robert Bostocke, and are to be sould at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings head
